issue.title: [R] Expose FileSystemDatasetWriteOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16200](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16200). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's a bit of logic in write_dataset() and in the write function in cpp that could be better encapsulated if we made an R6 class with a constructor.
